name: The Grandfather
description: One night The Grandfather went to give his wife a good night kiss, she ignored him as usual, this broke his heart every night. He went to sleep in his own bed, full of misery as usual, but this night would turn out to be different than the others.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or better Processor: Intel i3 or better Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: AMD 6870 or equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Version 9.0

reviews.review_text: I bought the game because I thought the art style looked very interesting. But over all, the game was not very good. The transitions where odd, and the puzzles more frustrating than intriguing. The story was nice, though I thought the game could have been more.

Its a different and unique game that takes some serious thought for an idiot like me to fully comprehend. It obviously took a lot of effort to create a game with such an intriguing concept as this with such an interesting art style that I don't see very often. The Puzzles are relatively simple if you have experience with puzzle games but for those who don't have that it experience it is much more of a challenge. It may be annoying to proceed in some aspects of the game but overall it is an interesting game that I would recommend to anyone that is interested in purchasing the game or anything remotely similar to it.
